briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Workplace Environment Study of Lisdexamfetamine Dimesylate (LDX) in Adults With Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
officialTitle: A Phase IIIb Randomized, Double-Blind, Multicenter, Placebo-Controlled, Dose Optimization, Crossover, Safety and Efficacy Workplace Environment Study of Lisdexamfetamine Dimesylate (LDX) in Adults With Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
summary: To evaluate the efficacy of LDX compared to placebo in adults with ADHD in the adult workplace environment (AWE) setting

primaryOutcome.measure: Permanent Product Measure of Performance (PERMP) Total Score Over the Treatment Day in the Crossover Phase
